title: **SOLD** T206 SGC Keeler Portrait EPDG & SGC Foley White SLer
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: **SOLD** T206 SGC Keeler Portrait EPDG & SGC Foley White SLer
posts.post_content:
Here's a pair of "Collector Grade" T206's with really nice looking fronts and some problems with the backs.

$OLD T206 Willie Keeler Portrait HOFer w/ EPDG back - SGC10 - back damage from being removed from an album, but also with a very interesting dark black stamp that I have been thus far been unable to identify. Front presents extremely well. A nice chance to pick up a hall of famer with an uncommon back at a cheap price!

$OLD T206 Foley White - Houston - Southern Leaguer SGC 10 - really strong front with a nickle sized spot of back damage on the Piedmont 350 reverse. 

Two great looking cards to add to your collection at a fraction of the cost without the back damage.

Shipping is included. Please PM if interested. "I'll take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations. 

Thanks for looking,

Steve

You can take the pair for a low low price of $OLD!! :D

Don't miss out folks!
